column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I was trying to be good and only order an espresso drink here. But
column2: the person taking my order asked me if it was my first time here. And I said yes. Boom! He brings out some delicious looking and huge croissants with a crispy caramelized sugar glaze around them. He states that I can have a "sample" and gives me one whole croissant. Whoa! Now
column3: that's just beyond generous of him and CBB. How can I say no to this?! Safe to say
column4: the croissant was buttery goodness. Of course
column5: I couldn't finish it myself! I also ordered their Cortado
column6: which was strong and fragrant. I would recommend ordering this
column7: since it went great with the croissant.
